history.proof: intros. unfold valid, dstate. qsimpl use: tpc_coh.

exceptions.tactic: intros cn others pts Hcoh Hvalid.
intros cn' others pts Hcoh Hvalid.
intros cn' others' pts Hcoh Hvalid.
intros cn' others' pts' Hcoh Hvalid.
destruct Hcoh' as [HcohSoup HcohDom Hvalid HlocalCoh].

original: intros cn others pts Hcoh Hvalid. unfold valid, dstate. intros [Hsoup Hdom Hlocal Hcoh']. unfold tpc_coh in Hcoh'. destruct Hcoh' as [HcohSoup HcohDom Hvalid HlocalCoh]. apply Hvalid.
